mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.title, b.author, b.image_url, c.name AS category_name FROM books b JOIN rental r ON b.book_id = r.book_id LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE b.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY b.book_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental (book_id, username, rental_date, is_returned) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{username}, #{rentalDate}, #{isReturned})
mapper.update: UPDATE rental SET return_date = NOW(), is_returned = 'returned' WHERE rental_id = #{rentalId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, b.title AS book_title FROM rental r JOIN books b ON r.book_id = b.book_id WHERE r.username = #{username} ORDER BY r.rental_date DESC
